content.question: The four pictures present a story. Imagine you are writing the story to a friend. Narrate a complete story as suggested by the pictures. Give your story a beginning, a middle, and an end.

frqParts.text: The four pictures present a story. Imagine you are writing the story to a friend. Narrate a complete story as suggested by the pictures. Give your story a beginning, a middle, and an end.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Use words appropriate for a given context.
